snippet: More than 1,200 Army recruiters and assistants are under investigation on suspicion of fraud involving tens of millions of dollars from a program aimed at increasing recruitment during the Iraq war, according to papers released Monday by a...
abstract: More than 1,200 Army recruiters and assistants are under investigation on suspicion of fraud involving tens of millions of dollars from program aimed at increasing recruitment during Iraq war.
lead_paragraph: More than 1,200 Army recruiters and assistants are under investigation on suspicion of fraud involving tens of millions of dollars from a program aimed at increasing recruitment during the Iraq war, according to papers released Monday by a congressional panel.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
